metadata.description: Improved Pattern Library for CodeGates with Precise, Context-Aware Patterns

STRUCTURED_LOGS.description: Ensure logs are structured and searchable for operational monitoring

expected_coverage.reasoning: Structured logging should be implemented across core application files

AVOID_LOGGING_SECRETS.description: Prevent sensitive data from being logged accidentally

expected_coverage.reasoning: No secrets should be logged - this is a security gate where 0 violations is the goal

javascript.description: JavaScript logging secrets with template literals

typescript.description: TypeScript logging secrets with template literals

csharp.description: C# logging secrets with string interpolation

AUDIT_TRAIL.description: Log critical business operations for audit compliance

expected_coverage.reasoning: Audit trails should be present in business logic files

CORRELATION_ID.description: Include correlation IDs for distributed tracing

expected_coverage.reasoning: Correlation IDs should be present in API and service files

all_languages.description: Injecting correlation ID into SLF4J MDC
Reading correlation ID from SLF4J MDC
Accessing correlation ID from request headers in Express
Setting correlation ID in response headers in Express
Extracting correlation ID from headers in Python web frameworks
Binding correlation ID to logger context (e.g., structlog)

LOG_API_CALLS.description: Log all API requests and responses for monitoring

expected_coverage.reasoning: API calls should be logged for monitoring and debugging

LOG_APPLICATION_MESSAGES.description: Log important application events and messages

expected_coverage.reasoning: Application messages should be logged across business logic

UI_ERRORS.description: Log client-side errors and UI exceptions

expected_coverage.reasoning: UI error logging should be present in frontend files

RETRY_LOGIC.description: Implement retry mechanisms for transient failures

expected_coverage.reasoning: Retry logic should be present in network and external service calls

TIMEOUTS.description: Implement timeouts for all I/O operations

expected_coverage.reasoning: Timeouts should be present in network and database operations

THROTTLING.description: Implement rate limiting and request throttling

expected_coverage.reasoning: Rate limiting should be present in API endpoints and external service calls

CIRCUIT_BREAKERS.description: Implement circuit breaker pattern for fault tolerance

expected_coverage.reasoning: Circuit breakers should be present in external service calls and critical operations

ERROR_LOGS.description: Comprehensive error logging and exception handling

expected_coverage.reasoning: Error logging should be present across all application layers

HTTP_CODES.description: Use appropriate HTTP status codes for API responses

expected_coverage.reasoning: HTTP status codes should be used consistently in API responses
Automated tests should cover critical business logic and API endpoints
